name: MissingLinkAdventures
0:
”Alexa, open Missing Link”
”Alexa, start Missing Link”
”Alexa, launch Missing Link”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: missing link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Come join Mr. Link, Sir Lionel and Adelina on a hilarious and thrilling adventure around the world. You’ll uncover clues, complete physical challenges, and solve riddles to unearth six fantastical creatures that live... in your very own home. Along the way you’ll discover that even the most mundane of creatures can have fascinating stories. 

An extraordinarily interactive audio experience, Missing Link Adventures include six immersive chapters that can be played – and replayed – in any order. Go ahead and explore the world of Missing Link, even before you see the new stop-motion classic in theaters.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
